about_the_game:
【Escape the secret room with Aicha, a breast-expanding robot!】

 

 ◆Story Overview

 
Upon opening your eyes, you find yourself in a room you've never seen before, seemingly imprisoned.

In this confined space, there's not just you but also someone else—or rather, a female android claiming to be 「Serving Doll Aisha」.

Collaborate with Aisha to achieve the goal of escaping this mysterious room! Sometimes, you may even receive special and passionate 「services」 from Aisha.

◆ System Overview

 (1)Classic Escape Room Game!

 
The main focus is the escape. Find room items, solve puzzles, and escape to meet your ultimate goal!

 (2)Assistance from Aisha!

 
Hand over discovered items to Aisha for hints on escaping! There might be moments when you need Aisha's help to escape.

 (3)Servitude Gameplay and Favorability

 
During the puzzle-solving, you can choose to accept Aisha's services at any time. Aisha has a favorability mechanism: As it increases, more service options become available. Favorability rises as you talk to Aisha and interact with her using items!

※ For players not adept at puzzles or escape rooms, a thoughtful 「Album Open Function」 is prepared!



 【3D Animation Centered Around Breasts!】

 

Perfectly replicated softness, texture, and weighty feel of breasts in first-person 3D animation! Boobs sway, bounce, and are at your mercy, right before your eyes~ Enjoy the proud, busty effects presented by 桃山プロダクション.

Service Skills：
Oral
Lap Pillow Titjob
Cowgirl Titjob
Titjob + Oral
Aisha on Top Oral
...And more.


 【Characters】

 

Serving Doll—Aisha (CV:桃音たぉ)

Age: 22
Height: 162cm
Weight: Slightly heavier than human females (due to internal mechanical structure and large breasts)
Measurements: B112-W63-H82 (P cup)

The robot is confined with the protagonist, addressing everyone in the room as "Master." Specifically manufactured to serve her Master, Aisha covers her eyes to protect her highly advanced optics. Her underwear is designed for immediate and constant service to her Master.

With a diligent and loyal personality, she unquestionably follows all commands of her Master.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or sexual acts ,General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10/WIN11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10/WIN11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a journey to escape this enigmatic room with the busty robot, 「Serving Doll Aisha」! A novel combination of classic escape-room challenges and cutting-edge 3D chest animations awaits you. Can you solve all the puzzles in the end and safely escape this Escape Room?
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
